product_name: Partners West Snow Sense: A Guide to Evaluating Snow Avalanche Hazard - 5th Edition
long_description: The updated edition of Snow Sense: A Guide to Evaluating Snow Avalanche Hazard is a comprehensive guide to evaluating backcountry danger and choosing safe routes.
short_description: The updated edition of Snow Sense: A Guide to Evaluating Snow Avalanche Hazard is a comprehensive guide to evaluating backcountry danger and choosing safe routes.
